channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: Corsair Void V2 Wireless Gaming Headset Is 31% Off
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: This is a sweet deal on a great headset.
item.content:encoded: You can snag the Corsair Void V2 Wireless Gaming Headset for a surprisingly low price of just $90 on Amazon right now. This is a massive 31% discount off its regular $130 price tag, which is incredible when you think about the 70 hours of battery life this headset offers.

item.title: The Windows 11 25H2 Update Just Hit Another Milestone
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.description: Windows 11 25H2 will be available to more people soon.
item.content:encoded: The long-awaited widespread availability of the Windows 11 2025 Update, officially known as version 25H2, is finally set to release. While Microsoft technically shipped the update on September 30, 2025, the rollout has taken a while, but this frustrating holding pattern will finally end.

item.title: GTA IV Just Got Its (Unofficial) Ultimate Edition, and You Have to Play It
item.dc:creator: Goran Damnjanovic
item.description: The GTA PC modding community just gave us another tasty treat.
item.content:encoded: Despite Take Two's efforts to shut it down, the GTA modding community is still alive and kicking. Their latest effort is Fusion Fix for Grand Theft Auto IV, a massive community mod that gives the PC version of GTA IV an Ultimate Edition treatment. GTA IV on PC has never looked this good.

item.title: Your Samsung Galaxy S22 Is Getting Its Last Major Update
item.dc:creator: Cory Gunther
item.description: One UI 8 is here, but it'll be time to upgrade your phone soon.
item.content:encoded: We have good news and bad news for those with the Samsung Galaxy S22, S22+, or Galaxy S22 Ultra. Right on time and just as promised, Samsung is sending out the big update to One UI 8 (Android 16) for your phones. However, it's the last major update you'll be getting.

item.title: 9 Google Messages Features Everyone Should Know
item.dc:creator: Aman Kumar
item.description: Google Messages feels a lot better when you start using these features.
item.content:encoded: From a built-in spam detector to the option of pinning messages and automatically deleting OTPs, the Google Messages app offers a variety of features. Here are nine Google Messages features that everyone should know about.

item.title: OxygenOS 16, Based on Android 16, Now Has a Release Date
item.dc:creator: Jorge A. Aguilar
item.content:encoded: OnePlus has announced that its next major software update, OxygenOS 16, built on top of Android 16, will launch in India on October 16. The company even teased the launch with the tagline “Intelligently Yours,” which is clearly a nod to the deep AI integration we can expect.

item.title: Mazda Enhances the CX-30 With Smart Upgrades for 2026
item.dc:creator: Tyler Dupont
item.description: The 2026 CX-30 arrives with key updates in tech, style, and features to boost value and appeal.
item.content:encoded: For 2026, one Mazda's most popular compact crossovers is getting a thoughtful round of updates designed to keep it fresh in a crowded market. These enhancements refine its appeal without straying from the winning formula that’s made it a standout in the segment.

item.title: Smart TV Makers Need to Kill Their Proprietary OSes
item.dc:creator: Sydney Butler
item.description: Imagine a world where your smart TV's software is as reliable as your smartphone's.
item.content:encoded: It seems that almost every big TV brand has their own custom operating system, and that sounds reasonable, until you consider that smart TVs are basically big stationary smartphones these days.

item.title: 5 Movies to Watch on Prime Video This Week (October 6 - 12)
item.dc:creator: Chris Snellgrove
item.description: A new week means a new chance to watch some killer movies. From comedies to slashers, here are the best films to watch on Prime Video this week!
item.content:encoded: You know how it is: even though there are countless new movies to watch on streaming each month, it's hard to find something worth your time. But what if someone else figured it out and all you had to worry about was the popcorn?

item.title: 5 Must-See HBO Max Movies to Stream This Week (October 6 - 12)
item.dc:creator: Derek Malcolm
item.description: From Spooky Season horror and thrlls to epic sci-fi and stand-up comedy, HBO Max has you covered.
item.content:encoded: Finally, October is upon us, which means we can start trickling a few more Spooky Season movies into our watchlists to get us in the mood for Halloween.
